attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2011-1166

Date: 2011-10-06

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of National Defence, hereby approves that the Minister of National Defence make payments in an amount not to exceed $477,420,274 in accordance with the Memorandum of Understanding Among the Department of National Defence of Canada and the Ministry of Defence of the Kingdom of Denmark and the Minister of Defence of the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg and the Minister of Defence of the Kingdom of the Netherlands and the New Zealand Defence Force and the Department of Defence of the United States of America Concerning the Joint Production, Operations, and Support of Wideband Global Satellite Communications.


Sur recommandation du ministre de la Défense nationale, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil approuve que le ministre de la Défense nationale fasse le paiement d’une somme maximale de 477 420 274 $ dans le cadre du protocole d’entente intitulé « Memorandum of Understanding Among the Department of National Defence of Canada and the Ministry of Defence of the Kingdom of Denmark and the Minister of Defence of the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg and the Minister of Defence of the Kingdom of the Netherlands and the New Zealand Defence Force and the Department of Defence of the United States of America Concerning the Joint Production, Operations, and Support of Wideband Global Satellite Communications ».
